_sText: This is a fun map updated with better lighting, improved textures, and cool effects such as a animated sky, rain and dustmote-things underground. It is fully asymetrical, small, and a combination of open/outdoors and dark underground fighting. A great map for GG, DM, or just wasting time. One of my favorites due to the speed of the game, and the teamwork that can develop while playing. Very fun.
